title: Remove the header navigation Upload button (selected element)

requirements.text: Remove the header navigation button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[2]/nav[1]/button[2] so it no longer renders in the app header navigation (this is the authenticated-only "Upload" button in the header nav).

quotes:
Retry
The user has selected the following 1 element from the page for context.
...
- XPath:
/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[2]/nav[1]/button[2]

acceptanceCriteria: When authenticated, the App header navigation no longer shows the "Upload" button (the second <button> in the <nav>).
When unauthenticated, the App header navigation still shows the "Gallery" button and the Login/Logout control continues to work.
All other routes and upload access behavior remain unchanged (users can still access the Upload view via existing routing mechanisms).
All user-facing text remains in English.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[2]/nav[1]/button[2].
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change backend authorization or artwork upload behavior.
Do not redesign or otherwise modify header layout beyond removing the selected Upload button.
Do not add new navigation entries or routes.
